short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See rate my professor details on lionpath

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can see ratings from ratemyprofessors.com for each professor in LionPath.

Select the campus from the dropdown and click 'Show Ratings' to see the ratings and other data from ratemyprofessors.com.

Another column 'ratings' will be attached to the original table in the LionPath.

A box showing the details of the professor reviews on the right side of the browser when you click the ratings column.

*updates:
- Added all the campuses for Penn State
- Fixed showing multiple 'ratings' columns when clicked twice.
